docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. generated exp(x) 计算指数 :math: y = e^x Parameters: Name Type Description Default x Variable 输入向量 required Returns: Name Type Description Variable Variable 输出向量 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def exp(x: Variable) -> Variable: """ 计算指数 :math:`y = e^x` Args: x (Variable): 输入向量 Returns: Variable: 输出向量 """ return Exp()(x) numerical_diff(func, x, eps=1e-05) 计算函数在某点的数值导数 :math: d_y = \frac{x_1 - x_2}{2 × eps} Parameters: Name Type Description Default func Function 待求导的函数 required x Variable 输入向量 required eps float 微小变化量，默认值为 1e-5 1e-05 Returns: Name Type Description ndarray ndarray 数值导数结果 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def numerical_diff( func: Callable, x: Variable, eps: float = 1e-5 ) -> ndarray: """ 计算函数在某点的数值导数 :math:`d_y = \\frac{x_1 - x_2}{2 × eps}` Args: func (Function): 待求导的函数 x (Variable): 输入向量 eps (float): 微小变化量，默认值为 1e-5 Returns: ndarray: 数值导数结果 """ x1 = Variable(x.data - eps) x2 = Variable(x.data + eps) y1 = func(x1) y2 = func(x2) return (y2.data - y1.data) / (2 * eps) sqrt(x) 计算平方根 :math: y = \sqrt{x} Parameters: Name Type Description Default x Variable 输入向量 required Returns: Name Type Description Variable Variable 输出向量 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def sqrt(x: Variable) -> Variable: """ 计算平方根 :math:`y = \\sqrt{x}` Args: x (Variable): 输入向量 Returns: Variable: 输出向量 """ return Sqrt()(x) square(x) 计算平方 :math: y = x^2 Parameters: Name Type Description Default x Variable 输入向量 required Returns: Name Type Description Variable Variable 输出向量 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def square(x: Variable) -> Variable: """ 计算平方 :math:`y = x^2` Args: x (Variable): 输入向量 Returns: Variable: 输出向量 """ return Square()(x)
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.text: 计算指数 :math: y = e^x Parameters: Name Type Description Default x Variable 输入向量 required Returns: Name Type Description Variable Variable 输出向量 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def exp(x: Variable) -> Variable: """ 计算指数 :math:`y = e^x` Args: x (Variable): 输入向量 Returns: Variable: 输出向量 """ return Exp()(x)
docs.title: exp()

docs.text: 计算函数在某点的数值导数 :math: d_y = \frac{x_1 - x_2}{2 × eps} Parameters: Name Type Description Default func Function 待求导的函数 required x Variable 输入向量 required eps float 微小变化量，默认值为 1e-5 1e-05 Returns: Name Type Description ndarray ndarray 数值导数结果 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def numerical_diff( func: Callable, x: Variable, eps: float = 1e-5 ) -> ndarray: """ 计算函数在某点的数值导数 :math:`d_y = \\frac{x_1 - x_2}{2 × eps}` Args: func (Function): 待求导的函数 x (Variable): 输入向量 eps (float): 微小变化量，默认值为 1e-5 Returns: ndarray: 数值导数结果 """ x1 = Variable(x.data - eps) x2 = Variable(x.data + eps) y1 = func(x1) y2 = func(x2) return (y2.data - y1.data) / (2 * eps)
docs.title: numerical_diff()

docs.text: 计算平方根 :math: y = \sqrt{x} Parameters: Name Type Description Default x Variable 输入向量 required Returns: Name Type Description Variable Variable 输出向量 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def sqrt(x: Variable) -> Variable: """ 计算平方根 :math:`y = \\sqrt{x}` Args: x (Variable): 输入向量 Returns: Variable: 输出向量 """ return Sqrt()(x)
docs.title: sqrt()

docs.text: 计算平方 :math: y = x^2 Parameters: Name Type Description Default x Variable 输入向量 required Returns: Name Type Description Variable Variable 输出向量 Source code in deepflow\functions\math.py def square(x: Variable) -> Variable: """ 计算平方 :math:`y = x^2` Args: x (Variable): 输入向量 Returns: Variable: 输出向量 """ return Square()(x)
